description: This file is a CMake configuration script used to locate and setup the curl library for a CMake-based build system. It finds the necessary include directories and library files for curl, handles standard arguments, and defines imported target properties.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Finds the directory containing the specified header file, curl/curl.h.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Locates the library file for curl with possible names 'curl'.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles the QUIETLY and REQUIRED arguments to determine if the package was found.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks specified variables as advanced, hiding them in GUIs unless explicitly shown.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties for imported and built targets, specifically for the curl shared library.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Creates an imported shared library target for curl.
